problem.p:
Starting from rest, a child throws a ball of mass m with an initial speed v at B degrees above the horizontal. The child then chases after the ball, accelerating at a constant acceleration a. If the child wants to catch the ball at the same height it was thrown, what must be the child's acceleration a?
Use g for the gravitational constant.
